content.rendered:
Directed by M. Padmakumar

Written by Sajeev Pillai. Shankar Ramakrishnan. Shankar Ramakrishnan

Cast Mammootty (Chandroth Valiya Panicker / Kurup). Unni Mukundan (Chandroth Panicker). Achuthan B. Nair (Chandroth Chanthunni). Siddique (Thalachennor). Prachi Tehlan (Unnimaya). Suresh Krishna (Pokkar). Manikuttan (Moyin). Sudev Nair (Rarichan). Kaniha (Chirudevi). Anu Sithara (Manikyam). Iniya (Unni Neeli). Tarun Arora (Zamar Koya). Kaviyoor Ponnamma (Chandroth Valiya Panicker’s Mother). Idavela Babu (Chandroth Family Member). Mohan Sharma (Zamorin). Maala Parvathi (Chandroth Panicker’s Mother). Meghanadhan (Chandroth Pothuvaal). Manikandan R. Achari (Kungan). G. Suresh Kumar (Mamangam Announcer). Baiju Ezhupunna (Konthi Nair). Jayan Cherthala (Mamangam Visitor). Sajitha Madathil (Karumari). Sudheer Sukumaran (Irama). Abu Salim (Warrior). Malavika Menon (Dancer).Nandhan Unni. Shafique Rahiman (Zamorin’s Soldier). Dinesh Prabhakar (Archer). Valsala Menon (Elder Lady in Chandroth Family). Saranya Anand (Woman in Brothel). Nilambur Ayisha (Old Lady in Chandroth Family). Viaan Mangalaserry (Warrior (as Vipin Mangalashery)) . Jojo George (Moosa).Vishnu Marakkal. Harish Pengan (Velichappadu). Shafeer Sait (King). Angel Shijoy (Kaniha (voice))

Languages Malayalam

Producers Ayjo Antony. Venu Kunnappilly. Vivek Ramadevan. Meera Thalakottur

Production Kavya Film
